house_listing.house_description: HUGE HOME FOR A LARGE FAMILY! For a dramatic effect, the family room and formal living have a ceiling that is two stories high! The kitchen features bleached ivory cabinets, Whirlpool white on white appliances, plus the new open concept plan to the living and breakfast areas. Open spindle handrail staircase! Upstairs are two baths and three other bedrooms and a huge gameroom with double door entry OR you may furnish the upstairs as four bedrooms. Zoned central heat/central air conditioning, privacy fenced backyard, brick & stucco exterior. Located within a golf course community.

highlights.item: 5 BRs/2 living areasOR4 BRs/3 living areas
Family room & formal living are 2 stories high
Located within a golf course community
